product_name: Serfas Thunderbolt USB Front Bike Light
long_description: With convenient mounting and a bright output up to 90 lumens, the Serfas Thunderbolt USB rechargeable front bike light gets you noticed when you're riding. The strip of 15 white, double-strength micro-LED bulbs puts out up to 90 lumens of light; strip design puts out a non-directional flood of light for wide coverage. Water-resistant, flexible and finish-friendly silicone body and adjustable straps stretch around your bike's frame or handlebar for easy, tool-free mounting and removal. 4 modes (with run times): high beam/constant (1.75 hrs.), low beam/constant (6.5 hrs.), high flash (3.5 hrs.), low flash (9 hrs.). The Serfas Thunderbolt USB rechargeable front bike light lets you recharge the light via a USB port; recharges in 2 hours.
